training_folder.help: Path(s) to folder(s) contianing training data.

validation_folder.help: Path to folder containing validation data.

num_epochs.help: Number of training epochs. One epoch means one run through all given training data.

learning_rate_decay.help: Rate at which to decay learning rate. A learning rate of 0.5 means the learning rate is halved every  <patience=5> epochs that the change in the loss function is below some epsilon

patience.help: Number of epochs of minimal (within some epsilon) change in loss function required before decaying learning rate

batch_size.help: Number of training samples per batch.

loss_function.help: Triple of loss function, target model output on which to compute loss function and weight. `FUNCTION` may be any of the following: ['L1', 'DPCL', 'MSE', 'KL']. Multiple loss function triples may be specified, each triple to its own `-loss_function` flag. E.g. to specify two different loss functions: `... --loss_function mse masks .4 --loss_function dpcl embeddings .6`

data_parallel.help: Train across all available GPUs using DataParallel.

curriculum_learning.help: Whether or not to perform curriculum learning

initial_length.help: Fraction of initial length to use (for curriculum learning)
